name: nGenera Corporation
overview:
nGenera is now Moxie software.

Moxie provides a new generation of social software that allows an organization’s employees to collaborate with each other and with partners, and serve and support customers better than ever possible before.

Through our Spaces social software platform, we empower people to make dramatic improvements in how they plan, design, build and sell their products and services, and support customers by connecting the right people at the right time, energizing those interactions and enabling knowledge sharing.

The highly intuitive Spaces social platform was created in collaboration with world-renowned design and innovation firm IDEO to simply work the way people do, driving high levels of adoption and engagement.

Our Spaces Social Software Platform is the most intuitive and extensive offering on the market, covering the following spaces:

â€¢Employee Engagement Spacesâ„¢: inside the enterprise social network and collaboration platform for getting work done

â€¢Customer Engagement Spacesâ„¢: the most complete suite of customer interaction and support software on the market, including phone, email, chat, knowledgebase, community and social media support spaces

In addition to its software, Moxie also offers world-class social software research expertise, strategy consulting and implementation services. Moxie is headquartered in Mountain View, CA, with offices in Austin, Bellevue, London and Toronto.
